name: Motion Activation
short_description:
Allows a webcam to be used as a motion detection device and allows for actions to be performed each time motion is detected.

This allows for more proximity based solutions to simple things. 
Screen Savers, for examples, can be set up so that if no motion is detected for a certain amount of time, the screensaver will automatically come up, and as soon as any motion is detected, screensaver will go away.
summary: Allows a webcam to be used as a motion detection device
